name: Space Shot Remastered
description:
Changelog: This is the remastered edition, so a lot has changed!

  • All-new sound effects
  • Adjusted particles
  • Added timer
  • Added post-processing effects
  • Made a retro, pixelated look
  • Spaceship rotation
  • Text hides when covered by spaceship
  • TOP SECRET: Added screenwrapping
  • Adjusted instructions
  • Changed spawnrates
  • Put on Newgrounds

Note: I wanted to keep the remastered edition as a separate game so I could keep both versions up.  Even though I made the original only months ago, I think it's cool how much I've grown as a developer.
